Welcome To The Lab!

I’m Tommi Toivonen, a Helsinki-based musician, sound designer, creative technologist with 8+ years of game audio design experience as well as 15+ years of broad experience within the music and new media fields in various kinds of projects. I currently work at VILD Music as a composer and sound designer.

I love to experiment with new interfaces for music composition, sound design and performance control. I play my own UFO and have two bands: Phantom and Kitkaliitto.
